welcome_message: Welcome to Rewrite Canada, your trusted partner in crafting the ideal resume that opens doors to new career opportunities. We specialize in creating personalized, professional resumes that showcase your unique skills, experiences, and achievements.
mission_description: At Rewrite Canada, our mission is to empower job seekers by providing expertly designed resumes that make a lasting impression. We understand that your resume is more than just a document; it’s a reflection of your professional journey and aspirations. Our goal is to help you stand out in a competitive job market and secure the position you deserve.
expertise_description: Our team of seasoned resume writers and career coaches brings years of industry experience to the table. We stay updated with the latest trends in resume formatting and content, ensuring your resume meets current standards and expectations.
personalized_description: We believe that every individual is unique, and so is their career path. Our personalized approach means that we take the time to understand your background, career goals, and strengths. We tailor your resume to highlight your most relevant skills and achievements, making it a powerful tool in your job search.
proven_results_description: Our clients' success is our top priority. We have a track record of helping job seekers across various industries secure interviews and job offers. Our professional resumes have proven to increase visibility and impact, giving you the confidence to pursue your career goals.
resume_writing_description: Whether you’re a recent graduate, mid-career professional, or seasoned executive, our custom resume writing service is designed to meet your needs. We create compelling, ATS-friendly resumes that highlight your qualifications and make you stand out to employers.
cover_letter_description: Complement your resume with a well-crafted cover letter. We write persuasive cover letters that tell your story and explain why you’re the perfect fit for the role.
linkedin_optimization_description: In today’s digital age, a strong LinkedIn profile is essential. We optimize your LinkedIn profile to increase your visibility, connect with potential employers, and showcase your professional brand.
career_coaching_description: Our career coaching services provide you with the guidance and support needed to navigate your job search, prepare for interviews, and make informed career decisions.
join_community_description: At Rewrite Canada, we’re more than just a resume writing service. We’re a community of career-driven individuals dedicated to supporting each other’s professional growth. Join us today and take the first step towards achieving your career aspirations.
contact_us_description: Ready to transform your resume and unlock new opportunities? Contact us today and let Rewrite Canada help you craft the perfect resume for your career journey.
join_our_team_description: At Rewrite Canada, we are committed to helping individuals achieve their career goals through expertly crafted resumes and personalized career services. Our team is passionate about making a difference in the lives of job seekers, and we’re always on the lookout for talented individuals who share our vision and dedication.
innovative_environment_description: We foster a culture of innovation and continuous learning. Our team stays ahead of industry trends, ensuring that we provide cutting-edge services to our clients. You’ll have the opportunity to work with the latest tools and techniques in resume writing and career coaching.
collaborative_culture_description: At Rewrite Canada, we believe in the power of collaboration. Our team members work closely together, sharing ideas and supporting one another to achieve common goals. You’ll be part of a supportive community that values your input and encourages professional growth.
impactful_work_description: Your work at Rewrite Canada will have a direct impact on our clients’ lives. By helping job seekers present their best selves to potential employers, you’ll play a crucial role in their career success. There’s nothing more rewarding than knowing you’ve contributed to someone’s journey towards their dream job.
career_development_description: We invest in our team’s growth and development. You’ll have access to ongoing training and professional development opportunities, enabling you to enhance your skills and advance your career. Whether you’re a seasoned professional or just starting out, we provide a clear path for your career progression.
resume_writer_description: Join our team of expert resume writers and help clients create standout resumes. You’ll work closely with job seekers to understand their career goals and craft resumes that highlight their strengths and achievements.
career_coach_description: As a career coach, you’ll provide personalized guidance to clients navigating their job search. You’ll assist with interview preparation, job search strategies, and career planning, helping clients make informed decisions about their professional future.
linkedin_specialist_description: Optimize clients’ LinkedIn profiles to increase their visibility and professional presence. You’ll create compelling profiles that effectively showcase clients’ skills and experiences, connecting them with potential employers and opportunities.
customer_support_description: Provide exceptional support to our clients, answering questions and resolving issues related to our services. You’ll ensure that every client has a positive experience with Rewrite Canada.
how_to_apply_description: If you’re passionate about helping others succeed and want to be part of a dynamic, growth-oriented team, we’d love to hear from you. To apply for a position at Rewrite Canada, please send your resume and a cover letter to
join_us: Join Us and Make a Difference
join_us_description: At Rewrite Canada, you’ll have the opportunity to make a meaningful impact every day. Join us and help shape the future of job seekers around the world. We look forward to welcoming you to our team!
salary_tools_intro: Understanding your market value and negotiating your salary are crucial steps in your job search and career advancement. At Rewrite Canada, we provide access to a variety of salary tools and resources that empower you to make informed decisions about your compensation. These tools help you research industry standards, evaluate job offers, and negotiate the best possible salary.
salary_calculators_desc: Salary calculators allow you to input your job title, location, and experience level to get an estimate of the typical salary range for your position. These tools take into account factors such as industry trends, geographic variations, and company size to provide accurate salary data. Popular salary calculators include those offered by Glassdoor, PayScale, and Indeed.
industry_reports_desc: Accessing detailed industry reports can give you a broader understanding of salary trends within your field. These reports often include information on average salaries, benefits, and compensation packages for various roles and experience levels. Resources like the Bureau of Labor Statistics (BLS) and professional associations often publish these reports annually.
cost_of_living_desc: When considering job offers in different locations, it’s important to factor in the cost of living. Cost of living comparison tools help you understand how far your salary will go in different cities. Websites like Numbeo and Expatistan provide detailed comparisons of living expenses, allowing you to make informed decisions about relocating for a job.
company_reviews_desc: Websites like Glassdoor and Indeed offer company reviews where current and former employees share their experiences, including information about salaries and benefits. Reviewing these insights can give you a sense of what to expect from a potential employer and help you gauge whether their compensation packages are competitive.
one_on_one_coaching_desc: Our career coaches provide one-on-one guidance on salary research and negotiation. We help you prepare for salary discussions, develop negotiation strategies, and build the confidence to ask for what you deserve. With our support, you’ll be well-equipped to navigate salary conversations and secure a compensation package that reflects your value.
exclusive_resources_desc: As a Rewrite Canada client, you’ll gain access to exclusive resources, including industry reports, salary surveys, and negotiation workshops. Our comprehensive toolkit ensures that you have all the information and skills needed to advocate for yourself effectively.
maximize_earning: Start Maximizing Your Earning Potential Today
maximize_earning_desc: Don’t leave your salary to chance. Take control of your career and maximize your earning potential with the help of Rewrite Canada's salary tools and resources. Contact us today to learn more about how we can support you in your job search and salary negotiations.
intro: At Rewrite Canada, we value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard your data when you use our website and services.

informationWeCollect.personal: We may collect personal information such as your name, email, phone number, mailing address, resume details, and payment information.
informationWeCollect.nonPersonal: We also collect non-personal information like IP address, browser type, and website behavior to improve our services.

howWeUse.serviceDelivery: We use your information to provide resume writing, career coaching, and LinkedIn profile optimization.
howWeUse.communication: We may contact you about our services, updates, and promotional offers. You can opt-out at any time.
howWeUse.analysis: Non-personal data helps us analyze website usage and improve security.

dataSecurity: We use appropriate security measures to protect your data but cannot guarantee absolute security.

sharingInformation.thirdParty: We may share data with trusted partners like payment processors and email services.
sharingInformation.businessTransfers: If we undergo a merger or sale, your information may be transferred.
sharingInformation.legalRequirements: We may disclose your data if required by law.

yourRights.accessCorrection: You can update or correct your personal data anytime.
yourRights.dataDeletion: You may request data deletion, subject to legal obligations.
yourRights.optOut: You can opt out of promotional emails anytime.

cookiesTracking: We use cookies to improve your experience. You can manage cookie settings in your browser.
thirdPartyLinks: Our website may link to third-party sites. We are not responsible for their privacy policies.
childrensPrivacy: Our services are not intended for individuals under 18. If a child provides personal data, we will delete it.
changesPolicy: We may update this Privacy Policy. Continued use of our services after changes means acceptance of the revised policy.
contactUs: If you have any questions, contact us at:
title: AI Resume Builder
description_ai: Welcome to Rewrite Canada's AI Resume Builder – an innovative solution designed to streamline the resume creation process and help you land your dream job. Our cutting-edge AI technology simplifies resume writing, ensuring that your skills and achievements are presented in the best possible light.

features.title: Intelligent Content Generation
features.description: Our AI analyzes your input and generates tailored content that aligns with industry standards and is optimized for Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS).

features.title: Customizable Templates
features.description: Choose from a range of professionally designed templates suited for different industries. Customize layouts, fonts, and colors to match your personal brand.

features.title: Skills & Keywords Optimization
features.description: AI scans job descriptions and suggests relevant keywords, increasing your chances of passing ATS filters and attracting recruiters.

features.title: Real-Time Feedback & Suggestions
features.description: Receive instant feedback on your resume’s content, structure, and impact. Improve your resume with AI-powered suggestions.

features.title: Easy-to-Use Interface
features.description: Our user-friendly platform makes resume building easy for everyone, from fresh graduates to seasoned professionals.

features.title: Experience-Specific Sections
features.description: AI helps tailor your resume by recommending relevant sections like work experience, education, certifications, and projects.

features.title: Multilingual Support
features.description: Build resumes in multiple languages, ensuring your application meets global employer expectations.

steps.title: Step 1: Sign Up & Input Your Information
steps.description: Create an account on Rewrite Canada and provide your career details, including work experience, education, skills, and achievements.

steps.title: Step 2: Choose a Template
steps.description: Browse our professional templates and select the one that best fits your industry and style preferences.

steps.title: Step 3: Generate & Customize Your Resume
steps.description: AI generates a resume draft based on your input. Customize content and layout while using real-time feedback for improvements.

steps.title: Step 4: Download & Apply
steps.description: Download your resume in PDF, DOCX, or other formats, and start applying for jobs with confidence.

why_choose_us_AI: Why Choose Our AI Resume Builder?

benefits.title: Efficiency & Speed
benefits.description: Create a high-quality resume in minutes, saving time and effort.

benefits.title: Professional Quality
benefits.description: Expertly crafted designs and content ensure a professional and impactful resume.

benefits.title: Increased Visibility
benefits.description: ATS-optimized resumes increase your chances of getting noticed by recruiters.

benefits.title: Continuous Improvement
benefits.description: Our AI learns from industry trends, offering up-to-date resume-building tools.

cta.title: Start Building Your Resume Today
cta.description: Transform your job application process with Rewrite Canada's  AI Resume Builder. Sign up now and take the first step toward landing your dream job with a professionally crafted resume that showcases your unique strengths and qualifications.

Ai_Skill_Tests_heading1: Elevate Your Hiring Process with AI Skill Tests
Ai_Skill_Tests_heading2: Key Features of Our AI Skill Tests
Ai_Skill_Tests_heading16: Benefits of Using AI Skill Tests
Ai_Skill_Tests_heading21: Start Using AI Skill Tests Today
Ai_Skill_Tests_paragraph1: At Rewrite Canada , we understand the importance of finding the right talent for your organization. Our AI Skill Tests are designed to streamline the hiring process by accurately assessing candidates abilities and matching them with the job requirements. Leveraging advanced AI technology, our skill tests provide a reliable, efficient, and unbiased way to evaluate potential hires.
Ai_Skill_Tests_paragraph2: Our AI Skill Tests cover a wide range of skills across various industries, including technical skills, soft skills, and role-specific competencies. Whether you re hiring for IT, marketing, finance, or any other field, our tests can be tailored to meet your specific needs.
Ai_Skill_Tests_paragraph3: Receive instant results and detailed analytics on candidates performance. Our AI analyzes the test outcomes to provide insights into each candidates strengths and areas for improvement, helping you make data-driven hiring decisions.
Ai_Skill_Tests_paragraph4: Design tests that align with your hiring requirements. You can choose from multiple question formats, including multiple-choice, coding challenges, case studies, and situational judgment tests. Customize the difficulty level and duration to match the job role.
Ai_Skill_Tests_paragraph5: Our AI Skill Tests eliminate human biases from the evaluation process. The AI objectively scores each test based on predefined criteria, ensuring a fair assessment of all candidates.
Ai_Skill_Tests_paragraph6: Adaptive testing technology adjusts the difficulty of questions based on the candidates performance. This ensures an accurate measurement of their skill level and provides a more personalized testing experience.
Ai_Skill_Tests_paragraph7: Our AI Skill Tests seamlessly integrate with popular Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS). This allows you to manage candidates, track their progress, and view test results all in one place, streamlining your recruitment workflow.
Ai_Skill_Tests_paragraph8: Identify skill gaps within your existing team and use our AI Skill Tests to assess training needs. This helps you create targeted development programs and ensure your team has the necessary skills to succeed.
Ai_Skill_Tests_paragraph9: Determine the skills and competencies you need to assess for the specific job role. Our team can help you outline the key criteria and design a customized test.
Ai_Skill_Tests_paragraph10: Use our intuitive platform to create the AI Skill Test. Choose from a variety of question types and formats, and set the difficulty level and time limits according to your requirements.
Ai_Skill_Tests_paragraph11: Send test invitations to candidates via email or integrate the test link into your job postings. Candidates can complete the test online at their convenience.
Ai_Skill_Tests_paragraph12: Review the real-time results and detailed analytics provided by our AI. Compare candidates performance and identify the best fit for your job role.
Ai_Skill_Tests_paragraph13: Use the insights gained from the AI Skill Tests to make confident, data-driven hiring decisions. The comprehensive assessment results  ensure you select the most qualified candidates for your organization.
Ai_Skill_Tests_paragraph14: Automate the initial screening process and reduce the time spent on manual evaluations. Our AI Skill Tests provide quick and accurate assessments, speeding up your hiring process.
Ai_Skill_Tests_paragraph15: Gain a deeper understanding of candidates abilities with precise and objective evaluations. Our AI technology ensures consistent and reliable results.
Ai_Skill_Tests_paragraph16: Offer candidates a seamless and user-friendly testing experience. The adaptive nature of our tests keeps candidates engaged and motivated.
Ai_Skill_Tests_paragraph17: Reduce the costs associated with traditional hiring methods. Our AI Skill Tests minimize the need for multiple interview rounds and help you identify top talent early in the process.
Ai_Skill_Tests_paragraph18: Transform your hiring process with Rewrite Canada ’s AI Skill Tests. Sign up now to experience the benefits of accurate, efficient, and unbiased candidate assessments.
Ai_Skill_Tests_paragraph19: Ready to elevate your hiring process? Visit our AI Skill Tests page and start creating customized skill assessments today!
Ai_Skill_Tests_paragraph20: Use our intuitive platform to create the AI Skill Test. Choose from a variety of question types and formats, and set the difficulty level and time limits according to your requirements.
Ai_Skill_Tests_paragraph21: Send test invitations to candidates via email or integrate the test link into your job postings. Candidates can complete the test online at their convenience.
Ai_Skill_Tests_paragraph22: Review the real-time results and detailed analytics provided by our AI. Compare candidates performance and identify the best fit for your job role.
Ai_Skill_Tests_paragraph23: Use the insights gained from the AI Skill Tests to make confident, data-driven hiring decisions. The comprehensive assessment results ensure you select the most qualified candidates for your organization.
Ai_Skill_Tests_paragraph24: Automate the initial screening process and reduce the time spent on manual evaluations. Our AI Skill Tests provide quick and accurate assessments, speeding up your hiring process.
Ai_Skill_Tests_paragraph25: Gain a deeper understanding of candidates abilities with precise and objective evaluations. Our AI technology ensures consistent and reliable results.
Ai_Skill_Tests_paragraph26: Offer candidates a seamless and user-friendly testing experience. The adaptive nature of our tests keeps candidates engaged and motivated.
Ai_Skill_Tests_paragraph27: Reduce the costs associated with traditional hiring methods. Our AI Skill Tests minimize the need for multiple interview rounds and help you identify top talent early in the process.
Ai_Skill_Tests_paragraph28: Transform your hiring process with Resume Intellect’s AI Skill Tests. Sign up now to experience the benefits of accurate, efficient, and unbiased candidate assessments.

Terms-and-Conditions.title: Terms and Conditions
Terms-and-Conditions.introduction: Welcome to Rewrite Canada. These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of Rewrite Canada's website and services. By accessing this website and using our services, you accept these terms and conditions in full. If you disagree with any part of these terms and conditions, please do not use our website or services.

sections.title: 1. Definitions
list: Client: Any individual or entity using the services of Rewrite Canada.
Company: Rewrite Canada.
Services: Resume writing, career coaching, LinkedIn profile optimization, and other career-related services provided by Rewrite Canada.

sections.title: 2. Use of Services
list: Clients must provide accurate and complete information when utilizing our services.
Services are intended for personal use only. Redistribution or resale of our services is prohibited.
Clients agree to use our services in a manner consistent with all applicable laws and regulations.

sections.title: 3. Payment and Refunds
list: Payment for services must be made in full before the commencement of any work.
All fees are non-refundable unless otherwise stated in a specific service agreement.
In case of dissatisfaction with our services, clients must contact us within 7 days of receiving the final product. We will make reasonable efforts to address and rectify any issues.

sections.title: 4. Intellectual Property
list: All content, materials, and services provided by Rewrite Canada are protected by intellectual property laws.
Clients are granted a limited license to use the content and materials for personal, non-commercial purposes.
Reproduction, distribution, or modification of our content and materials without prior written consent is prohibited.

sections.title: 5. Confidentiality
list: Rewrite Canada respects the privacy and confidentiality of its clients.
Any personal information provided by clients will be used solely for the purpose of delivering services and will not be shared with third parties without explicit consent.
Clients agree not to disclose any confidential information obtained through our services to third parties.

sections.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
list: Rewrite Canada will not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising out of or in connection with the use of our services.
We do not guarantee employment or specific job outcomes as a result of using our services.

sections.title: 7. Disclaimer of Warranties
list: Our services are provided on an as-is and as-available basis. Rewrite Canada makes no warranties, express or implied, regarding the accuracy, reliability, or completeness of our services.
We do not warrant that our services will meet clients' expectations or that any errors or defects will be corrected.

sections.title: 8. Changes to Terms and Conditions
list: Rewrite Canada reserves the right to modify or update these terms and conditions at any time without prior notice.
Continued use of our website and services after any changes signifies acceptance of the revised terms and conditions.

sections.title: 9. Governing Law
list: These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which Rewrite Canada operates.
Any disputes arising out of or in connection with these terms and conditions shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in that jurisdiction.

sections.title: 10. Contact Information
list: If you have any questions or concerns about these terms and conditions, please contact us at:
Email: dummy@rewritecanada.ca

Terms-and-Conditions.closing: These terms and conditions ensure a clear understanding of our services and the responsibilities of both Rewrite Canada and our clients.
Terms-and-Conditions.contact: If you have any questions, please contact us.

Ai_CV_Parsing_h1: Transforming Recruitment with Advanced AI CV Parsing
Ai_CV_Parsing_h2: Key Features of Our AI CV Parsing Tool
Ai_CV_Parsing_h16: Benefits of Using AI CV Parsing
Ai_CV_Parsing_h21: Start Using AI CV Parsing Today
Ai_CV_Parsing_h26: Benefits of Using AI CV Parsing
Ai_CV_Parsing_p1: At Rewrite Canada , we leverage cutting-edge AI CV parsing technology to streamline the recruitment process, making it faster and more efficient for both employers and job seekers. Our AI CV parsing tool accurately extracts and analyzes key information from CVs, helping you identify the best candidates quickly and effectively.
Ai_CV_Parsing_p2: Our AI CV parser uses sophisticated algorithms to extract essential details from CVs, including personal information, contact details, work experience, education, skills, and certifications. The extracted data is organized in a structured format, making it easy to review and compare candidates.
Ai_CV_Parsing_p3: Our parser can handle CVs in various formats, such as PDF, DOC, DOCX, and TXT. This flexibility ensures that no matter how candidates submit their CVs, our tool can process and analyze them efficiently.
Ai_CV_Parsing_p4: Utilizing advanced NLP techniques, our AI CV parser understands the context and nuances of human language. This enables it to accurately interpret job titles, skills, and responsibilities, even if they are phrased differently across CVs.
Ai_CV_Parsing_p5: Our AI CV parsing tool integrates seamlessly with your Applicant Tracking System (ATS), automatically matching candidate profiles with job descriptions. This automation reduces manual effort and ensures that only the most relevant candidates are shortlisted.
Ai_CV_Parsing_p6: The parser identifies and extracts key skills and keywords from CVs,comparing them against the job requirements. This ensures that candidates who meet the necessary criteria are prioritized, improving the quality of your candidate pool.
Ai_CV_Parsing_p7: Tailor the parsing rules to match your specific hiring needs. You can define the criteria for extracting and prioritizing information, ensuring that the parser aligns with your recruitment strategy.
Ai_CV_Parsing_p8: We prioritize data security and privacy. Our AI CV parsing tool complies with all relevant data protection regulations, ensuring that candidate information is handled with the utmost care and confidentiality.
Ai_CV_Parsing_p9: Upload individual CVs or bulk CV files into the AI CV parsing tool. Our system supports various file formats and ensures quick and efficient processing.
Ai_CV_Parsing_p10: The AI CV parser processes the uploaded CVs, extracting key information and organizing it into a structured format. This includes details like contact information, work history, education, skills, and more.
Ai_CV_Parsing_p11: Access the parsed data through an intuitive dashboard. Review and analyze candidate profiles, compare qualifications, and filter candidates based on your specific criteria.
Ai_CV_Parsing_p12: Integrate the parsed data with your ATS to automate the candidate matching process. The AI matches candidates profiles with job descriptions, ensuring that only the most qualified candidates are shortlisted.
Ai_CV_Parsing_p13: Use the detailed, structured data to make informed hiring decisions. Our AI CV parsing tool provides you with a comprehensive view of each candidate, enabling you to select the best fit for your job openings.
Ai_CV_Parsing_p14: Reduce the time spent on manual CV screening and data entry. Our AI CV parser processes CVs quickly and accurately, allowing you to focus on higher-value recruitment tasks.
Ai_CV_Parsing_p15: Eliminate human errors and biases from the CV screening process. Our AI technology ensures consistent and precise data extraction, leading to better hiring decisions.
Ai_CV_Parsing_p16: Provide a smoother and faster recruitment experience for candidates. With quick and accurate CV processing, candidates receive timely feedback and updates.
Ai_CV_Parsing_p17: Handle large volumes of CVs effortlessly. Our AI CV parsing tool can scale to meet the demands of high-volume recruitment campaigns, ensuring that no candidate is overlooked.
Ai_CV_Parsing_p18: Revolutionize your recruitment process with Rewrite Canada ’s AI CV parsing tool. Sign up now to experience the benefits of efficient, accurate, and automated CV processing.
Ai_CV_Parsing_p19: Ready to transform your recruitment process? Visit our AI CV Parsing page and start optimizing your candidate selection today!
AI-Enhanced_h1: Ensuring Precision and Reliability in Resume Creation
AI-Enhanced_h1A: Key Features of AI-Enhanced Resume Accuracy
AI-Enhanced_h2A: Key Features of AI-Enhanced Resume Accuracy
AI-Enhanced_h19: Start Enhancing Your Resume Accuracy Today
AI-Enhanced_h29: Start Enhancing Your Resume Accuracy Today
AI-Enhanced_p1: At Rewrite Canada, we understand that the accuracy of your resume can significantly impact your chances of landing your dream job. Our AI-enhanced resume accuracy tools ensure that your resume is not only compelling but also precise and error-free. Leveraging advanced AI technology, we help you create resumes that truly reflect your qualifications and experiences.
AI-Enhanced_p2: Our AI-powered tools meticulously check for grammar, spelling, and punctuation errors. This ensures that your resume is polished and professional, making a strong impression on potential employers.
AI-Enhanced_p3: The AI reviews your resume for consistency in formatting, including font styles, sizes, bullet points, and spacing. This creates a visually appealing and uniform document that is easy to read.
AI-Enhanced_p4: Our AI verifies key details such as dates of employment, job titles, and educational qualifications. This reduces the risk of inaccuracies and discrepancies that could raise red flags with employers.
AI-Enhanced_p5: The AI scans job descriptions to identify relevant skills and keywords. It then checks your resume to ensure that these crucial elements are included, enhancing your chances of passing through Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS).
AI-Enhanced_p6: The AI prompts you to quantify your achievements, such as including specific numbers and metrics. This adds credibility to your resume and provides tangible evidence of your accomplishments.
AI-Enhanced_p7: Our AI analyzes the relevance and clarity of your resume content. It highlights sections that may be vague or off-topic and suggests improvements to ensure your resume is focused and impactful.
AI-Enhanced_p8: The AI checks your resume for any potential plagiarism issues, ensuring that all content is original and unique to you. This maintains the integrity of your resume and sets you apart from other candidates.
AI-Enhanced_p9: Upload your resume to the Rewrite Canada platform. Our AI will start analyzing your document immediately.
AI-Enhanced_p10: The AI scans your resume for errors, inconsistencies, and missing information. It evaluates grammar, formatting, data accuracy, and keyword relevance.
AI-Enhanced_p11: Within minutes, you’ll receive a detailed report highlighting areas for improvement. The AI provides specific suggestions for correcting errors, enhancing content, and optimizing formatting.
AI-Enhanced_p12: Implement the suggested changes to refine your resume. Use the AI’s feedback to ensure that your resume is accurate, professional, and tailored to the job you’re applying for.
AI-Enhanced_p13: Perform a final review of your resume using our AI tool to ensure all adjustments have been made and your resume is in top shape.
AI-Enhanced_p14: A polished, error-free resume demonstrates your attention to detail and professionalism, making a positive impression on recruiters.
AI-Enhanced_p15: With an accurate and well-crafted resume, you can confidently apply for jobs, knowing that your application is strong and reliable.
AI-Enhanced_p16: Optimizing your resume for accuracy and relevance increases your chances of passing through ATS filters and being shortlisted for interviews.
AI-Enhanced_p17: Our AI tools automate the resume review process, saving you time and effort while ensuring a high level of precision and quality.
AI-Enhanced_p18: Transform your resume with Rewrite Canada's AI-enhanced accuracy tools. Sign up now to create a resume that is polished, precise, and professional.

skill.instructions: Please take a moment to read the instructions carefully before proceeding.
skill.common_instructions: Following instructions are common for all users.
skill.instruction_1: The duration of the test is 10 minutes*. Your answer gets automatically submitted after 10 minutes*.
skill.instruction_2: This test consists of 15* multiple-choice questions.
skill.instruction_3: You may attempt the questions in any order.
skill.instruction_4: Please select the correct answer and click the Save and next button.
skill.instruction_5: Please click skip if you wish to skip a question. You may come back and answer the question later.
skill.instruction_6: Please click on the Submit Assessment button after answering all the questions.
skill.instruction_7: Do not close the window before submitting the test.
skill.instruction_8: Tests will be automatically submitted after the given time limit.
skill.create_or_upload: Please create or upload resume to take test, using below link.

aiResumeEnhancer.title: AI Resume Enhancer
aiResumeEnhancer.subtitle: Elevate Your Job Applications with AI-Driven Enhancements
aiResumeEnhancer.intro: At Rewrite Canada, we believe that every job seeker deserves a standout resume that effectively showcases their skills and experiences. Our AI Resume Enhancer is designed to elevate your resume, ensuring it meets industry standards and captures the attention of recruiters. Using advanced AI technology, we transform your resume into a powerful tool for career success
aiResumeEnhancer.featuresTitle: Key Features of Our AI Resume Enhancer
aiResumeEnhancer.feature1Desc: Our AI analyzes your resume content to ensure it is concise, relevant, and impactful. It helps you highlight key achievements, skills, and experiences that align with the job you're applying for.
aiResumeEnhancer.feature2Desc: Receive personalized suggestions on how to improve your resume. The AI provides specific advice on language, tone, and structure, helping you create a compelling narrative that resonates with hiring managers.
aiResumeEnhancer.feature3Desc: Our AI Resume Enhancer tailors your resume to fit the standards and expectations of your target industry. Whether you're in tech, finance, healthcare, or any other field, our AI ensures your resume speaks the industry language.
aiResumeEnhancer.feature4Desc: The AI scans job descriptions to identify critical keywords and phrases. It then suggests incorporating these keywords into your resume to increase your chances of passing through Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS).
aiResumeEnhancer.feature5Desc: Our AI emphasizes your most relevant skills based on the job description. It ensures that your resume showcases your strengths in a way that aligns with employer expectations.
aiResumeEnhancer.feature6Desc: The AI prompts you to quantify your achievements, such as including specific numbers and metrics. This adds credibility to your resume and provides tangible evidence of your accomplishments.
aiResumeEnhancer.feature7Desc: Receive recommendations on improving the visual layout of your resume. The AI ensures that your resume is not only informative but also aesthetically pleasing, making it easier for recruiters to read.
aiResumeEnhancer.feature8Desc: The AI checks for and corrects grammatical, spelling, and punctuation errors. This ensures your resume is polished and professional, free of any distracting mistakes.
aiResumeEnhancer.step1Desc: Upload your existing resume to the Rewrite Canada platform. Our AI will start analyzing your document immediately.
aiResumeEnhancer.step2Desc: The AI evaluates your resume, examining content, structure, keywords, and overall presentation. It identifies areas that need improvement and generates a comprehensive enhancement plan.
aiResumeEnhancer.step3Desc: Within minutes, you'll receive detailed recommendations on how to enhance your resume. The AI provides actionable insights and specific suggestions for improvement.
aiResumeEnhancer.step4Desc: Make the suggested changes to your resume. Use the AI's feedback to refine content, optimize keywords, and improve the visual layout.
aiResumeEnhancer.benefitsTitle: Benefits of Using AI Resume Enhancer
aiResumeEnhancer.benefit1Desc: Create a high-quality, polished resume that meets industry standards and captures the attention of hiring managers.
aiResumeEnhancer.benefit2Desc: Optimize your resume for ATS and keyword searches, increasing your chances of being shortlisted for interviews.
aiResumeEnhancer.benefit3Desc: Receive tailored recommendations that address your unique career goals and the specific requirements of your target job.
aiResumeEnhancer.benefit4Desc: Save time and effort with automated enhancements that ensure your resume is comprehensive and impactful.
aiResumeEnhancer.startEnhancingDesc: Transform your resume with Rewrite Canada's AI Resume Enhancer. Sign up now to create a resume that stands out and opens doors to new career opportunities.
aiResumeEnhancer.getStartedDesc: Ready to elevate your resume? Visit our AI Resume Enhancer page and start refining your resume today!

aiJobMatchApply.title: AI-Job Match & Apply
aiJobMatchApply.subtitle: Simplifying Your Job Search with AI Technology
aiJobMatchApply.intro: At Rewrite Canada, we aim to make your job search efficient and effective with our AI Job Match & Apply tool. This innovative technology uses advanced algorithms to match your skills and experiences with relevant job opportunities, streamlining the application process and increasing your chances of landing the perfect job.
aiJobMatchApply.featuresTitle: Key Features of Our AI Job Match & Apply Tool
aiJobMatchApply.feature1Desc: Our AI analyzes your resume and profile to identify job opportunities that align with your skills, experience, and career goals. This ensures that you apply for positions where you are most likely to succeed.
aiJobMatchApply.feature2Desc: Receive real-time notifications about new job postings that match your profile. Stay updated on the latest opportunities without having to constantly search job boards.
aiJobMatchApply.feature3Desc: Simplify the application process with one-click applications. Our AI auto-fills your resume and other required details, allowing you to apply to multiple jobs quickly and efficiently.
aiJobMatchApply.feature4Desc: Ensure that your resume passes through Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS) with ease. Our AI optimizes your resume with relevant keywords and formats it to meet ATS standards, increasing your chances of being noticed by recruiters.
aiJobMatchApply.feature5Desc: Use advanced filters to narrow down job listings based on criteria such as location, industry, salary range, and company size. This helps you find the most relevant job opportunities faster.
aiJobMatchApply.feature6Desc: Our AI identifies any skill gaps between your current profile and the job requirements. It provides recommendations for courses or certifications that can help you qualify for your desired positions.
aiJobMatchApply.feature7Desc: Keep track of all your job applications in one place. Our tool provides a dashboard where you can monitor the status of your applications, upcoming interviews, and follow-up tasks.
aiJobMatchApply.feature8Desc: Gain insights into potential employers with detailed company profiles. Learn about company culture, values, benefits, and recent news to make informed decisions about where to apply.
aiJobMatchApply.step1Desc: Sign up on the Rewrite Canada platform and create your profile. Upload your resume and provide details about your skills, experiences, and career aspirations.
aiJobMatchApply.step2Desc: The AI scans your profile and resume, analyzing your qualifications and preferences. It matches you with suitable job opportunities from our extensive database.
aiJobMatchApply.step3Desc: Get a list of personalized job matches that align with your profile. The AI continuously updates this list as new job openings become available.
aiJobMatchApply.step4Desc: Use the one-click application feature to apply for jobs directly through the platform. The AI auto-fills your application details, making the process quick and hassle-free.
aiJobMatchApply.step5Desc: Monitor the progress of your job applications through the dashboard. Receive updates on application status, interview schedules, and follow-up actions.
aiJobMatchApply.step6Desc: Follow the AI's recommendations to bridge any skill gaps. Take suggested courses or earn certifications to improve your qualifications and increase your job match accuracy.
aiJobMatchApply.benefitsTitle: Benefits of Using AI Job Match & Apply
aiJobMatchApply.benefit1Desc: Save time and effort by receiving personalized job matches and applying with just one click. The AI handles the heavy lifting, so you can focus on preparing for interviews and advancing your career.
aiJobMatchApply.benefit2Desc: Optimize your job search with targeted matches and ATS-friendly applications. This increases your chances of being shortlisted for interviews and ultimately landing the job.
aiJobMatchApply.benefit3Desc: Enjoy a tailored job search experience that aligns with your unique skills, experiences, and career goals. The AI provides relevant opportunities and actionable insights for continuous improvement.
aiJobMatchApply.benefit4Desc: Manage your entire job search process from one platform. Track applications, receive real-time alerts, and gain valuable insights into potential employers.
aiJobMatchApply.startUsingTitle: Start Using AI Job Match & Apply Today
aiJobMatchApply.startUsingDesc: Transform your job search with Rewrite Canada's AI Job Match & Apply tool. Sign up now to discover job opportunities that perfectly match your profile and streamline your path to career success.
aiJobMatchApply.getStartedDesc: Ready to find your dream job? Visit our AI Job Match & Apply page and start matching with top job opportunities today!

pricing.title: Pricing Plans
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that works best for you
pricing.intro: Our pricing plans are designed to accommodate all your resume building needs.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services and plans.
faq.question1: How does the 7-day trial subscription period work? Do I get full access with the trial?
faq.answer1: Yes! The trial gives you 100% access to all resume tools, templates, cover letters, and download formats.
faq.question2: Do you have a money-back guarantee?
faq.answer2: Yes. We offer a no-questions-asked 7-day money-back guarantee. If you purchase a plan and decide within 7 days that it wasn’t worth it, we’ll give you a refund.
faq.answer3: Yes, you can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your plan at any time from the app. If you need help, reach out to us using the link below.
faq.answer4: We offer resume building, career counseling, and job placement assistance.
